content:
I'm here to provide information and assist with your booking, not to confirm bookings on your behalf.

Regarding the cancellation policy at Remm Akihabara Hotel, here are the details:

* Cancellations or modifications can be made up to 24 hours before the scheduled check-in time without penalty.
* If you cancel or modify your reservation within 24 hours of check-in, a penalty of one night's stay will be charged to your credit card.
* If you fail to show up or cancel on the day of check-in, a penalty of 100% of the total booking amount will be charged.

Please note that the hotel's cancellation policy may vary depending on the room type, rate plan, or special promotions. I recommend checking the hotel's website or contacting them directly for the most up-to-date information.

Additionally, some credit cards or travel agencies may have their own cancellation policies or fees, so be sure to review those as well.

Is there anything else you'd like to know about Remm Akihabara Hotel or would you like to explore other accommodation options?
